# Overview 

This vignette is an attempt to use the [`lobstr` package](https://lobstr.r-lib.org/index.html) to view module functions.

```{r pkgs, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(dbap)
library(lobstr)
library(NHANES)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(fs)
library(shiny)
```
